title: (x) ESD Logo - Helvetica, Verdana {Grant}
content:
I'm hoping someone can identify the typefaces for both ESD and THE ENGINEERING SOCIETY OF DETROIT. For the ESD, the closest I can come up with is Helvetica Black Italic, which isn't a match. Thanks!   
   
 ![ESD Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000415im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16238.gif)
author: nick

comments.content: 'ESD' could be a custom emboldened version of Helvetica Black Italic. The 'Engineering Society' text is definitely [Verdana Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000415/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/verdana/).
